subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text: {{Han simp|幚|f2=帛|t2=巾}}, a variant of {{zh-l|*幫}} (with the phonetic {{zh-l|*封}} replaced with {{zh-l|*邦}}). Officially adopted as the simplified form of {{zh-l|*幫}} in the ''Chinese Character Simplification Scheme'' ({{w2|zh|pref=《|s:漢字簡化方案|漢字簡化方案|suf=》}}) in 1956.
